mapper.update: update ecs_pickup_point set shop_name = #{shop_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{province_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_id = #{city_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, district_id = #{district_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_id = #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, shop_name, address, phone, contact, province_id, city_id, district_id, supplier_id from ecs_pickup_point where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, shop_name, address, phone, contact, province_id, city_id, district_id, supplier_id from ecs_pickup_point
